skillTree.name: Slann Gold
skillTree.description: It is well known that Lustrian gold is enchanted with all manner of esoteric properties; Harkon thinks it will restore his fractured mind!

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic starting amount: -10

skillTree.name: Death Shriek Terrorgheist
skillTree.description: Harkon's personal mount is a dreadful thing indeed - a Terrorgheist with a piercing, banshee-like shriek that has the power to stun any who hear it.

skillTree.name: Lucky Charm
skillTree.description: "It's a rabbit's foot. A rabbit. No… Oh never mind - it brings me luck. It does! Trust me!"

skillTree.name: Tenacity
skillTree.description: You'd better kill this one or they'll keep coming back until one of you is dead. Even then, there's no guarantee it'll be over!

skillTree.name: Fractured Mind
skillTree.description: Harkon's personality has been broken into many parts, the end result of his insatiable lust for power.

skillTree.name: Man-o-War
skillTree.description: Some seafarers appear to have been born for the role.

effects.description: Leadership: +8 for Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob and Depth Guard units
Hero capacity: +1 for Vampire Fleet Captains
Hero recruit rank: +1 for Vampire Fleet Captains

skillTree.name: Severed from the Winds
skillTree.description: The magical backlash Harkon suffered whilst trying to increase his power left him cut off from the Winds of Magic forever.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic starting amount: -10

skillTree.name: Hand Cannon
skillTree.description: By which death is expertly dealt, assuming it doesn't blow your hand off in the process!

effects.description: Missile strength: +8% for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob and Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob units

skillTree.name: Moment of Lucidity
skillTree.description: Sometimes, by chance it seems, the disparate threads are drawn together. Gods help you when they are.

skillTree.name: Pirate King
skillTree.description: His crimes are without number and his villainy without end… behold the Pirate King!

skillTree.name: Supernatural Horror
skillTree.description: To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

skillTree.name: Forger
skillTree.description: "They'll never know the difference, even up close."

skillTree.name: Smuggler
skillTree.description: If there's duty to be paid, rest assured that this one will find a way around it.

skillTree.name: Poacher
skillTree.description: The beasts of the world belong to everyone, never a single individual.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +2 for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob

skillTree.name: Arsonist
skillTree.description: Fire, to destroy all that you have done; fire, to end all you've become.

effects.description: Missile strength: +8% for Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units

skillTree.name: Monkey Jacket
skillTree.description: "Yes, they’re from the east. Annoying, yet useful - their hides, particularly…"

skillTree.name: Swashbuckler
skillTree.description: If there's swash to be buckled, this one will be right at the front, in the thick of the fray.

skillTree.name: Master Strike
skillTree.description: Strike hard, strike true.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Taunt
skillTree.description: There is something to be said for whipping the foe into a frenzy before the fight is joined.

skillTree.name: Cutlass
skillTree.description: "Dark Magic might be effective, but there's no substitute for a good blade in your hands."

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Vampiric Leap
skillTree.description: The strength and agility of the Vampire comes from a place beyond: the supernatural realm of the Unliving.

skillTree.name: Wild-Eyed
skillTree.description: "Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"

skillTree.name: Hornswaggle
skillTree.description: You have to watch this one - when you shake their hand, count your fingers afterwards.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Held Together by Screws
skillTree.description: Bone, muscle and sinew cannot always be relied upon to hold together unassisted.

effects.description: Melee defence: +4 for Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob and Depth Guard units
Leadership: +4 for Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob and Depth Guard units
Melee defence: +6 for Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob and Depth Guard units
Leadership: +8 for Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob and Depth Guard units
Melee defence: +8 for Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob and Depth Guard units

skillTree.name: Reanimated Marksman
skillTree.description: Death hasn't got in the way of this one's sure-shotted aim; in fact, if anything, he's got better.

effects.description: Ammunition: +8% for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob, Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob and Deck Gunners units
Missile strength: +8% for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob, Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob and Deck Gunners units
Ammunition: +12% for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob, Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob and Deck Gunners units
Missile strength: +12% for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob, Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob and Deck Gunners units
Ammunition: +18% for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob, Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob and Deck Gunners units

skillTree.name: Black Powder Overload
skillTree.description: You can't have too much of a good thing and a bit of what you fancy does no harm.

effects.description: Ammunition: +8% for Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units
Missile strength: +8% for Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units
Ammunition: +12% for Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units
Missile strength: +12% for Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units
Ammunition: +18% for Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units

skillTree.name: Rotten Death
skillTree.description: It never ends well.

effects.description: Physical resistance: 3% for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units
Physical resistance: 6% for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units
Melee defence: +4 for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units
Physical resistance: 10% for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units
Melee defence: +8 for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units

skillTree.name: Haunting Horror
skillTree.description: What has been seen cannot be unseen.

effects.description: Missile strength: +10% for Deck Droppers units
Melee attack: +4 for Terrorgheist, Scurvy Dogs and Syreens units
Missile strength: +15% for Deck Droppers units
Charge bonus: +6 for Terrorgheist, Scurvy Dogs and Syreens units
Melee attack: +8 for Terrorgheist, Scurvy Dogs and Syreens units
Missile strength: +20% for Deck Droppers units
Charge bonus: +12 for Terrorgheist, Scurvy Dogs and Syreens units

skillTree.name: Drowned & Bound
skillTree.description: Like Unliving moths drawn inexorably towards a dazzling flame, the risen drowned strive - and stumble - to always be close to the one who has bound them.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +6% for Animated Hulks and Mournguls units
Weapon strength: +9% for Animated Hulks and Mournguls units
Melee attack: +4 for Animated Hulks and Mournguls units
Weapon strength: +12% for Animated Hulks and Mournguls units
Melee attack: +8 for Animated Hulks and Mournguls units
Charge bonus: +10 for Bloated Corpse units

skillTree.name: Avast Ye!
skillTree.description: "Listen very carefully, me hearties, I shall say this only once… Quiet! Stromfels' stinkin' breath!"

skillTree.name: Deadly March
skillTree.description: The once-men of the Undead legions march ever onwards, according to the will of their binder.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 15% for Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob and Depth Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee attack: +8 for Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob and Depth Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
Armour: +18 for Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob and Depth Guard units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Ensorcelled Weapons
skillTree.description: This is a dirty business, that much is certain, so why not get a little extra help to give yourself an edge?

effects.description: Missile strength: +12% for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob, Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob, Deck Gunners, Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units (Rank 7 and above)
Armour: +12 for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob, Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob, Deck Gunners, Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units (Rank 7 and above)
Magic resistance: 15% for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob, Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob, Deck Gunners, Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Masterly Splicing
skillTree.description: Their rope skills are really rather excellent, considering how long the entire crew have been dead.

effects.description: Leadership: +8 for Deck Droppers, Scurvy Dogs, Terrorgheist, Animated Hulks, Mournguls and Syreens units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee defence: +8 for Deck Droppers, Scurvy Dogs, Terrorgheist, Animated Hulks, Mournguls and Syreens units (Rank 7 and above)
Speed: +12% for Deck Droppers, Scurvy Dogs, Terrorgheist, Animated Hulks, Mournguls and Syreens units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Hardened by Death
skillTree.description: Surviving death tends to instil a certain toughness in one.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +12% for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee attack: +8 for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units (Rank 7 and above)
Magic resistance: 15% for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: All Hands Hoay!
skillTree.description: "Now listen up an' listen good… here be the plan…"

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Binded to Service
skillTree.description: They could not break free, even if they wanted to.

skillTree.name: Ghost Fleet
skillTree.description: Cursed to haunt the waves forever, never finding rest or solace.

skillTree.name: Freebooter
skillTree.description: If it's not tacked down, this one'll 'ave it and kill anyone who gets in their way.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.name: Sea Dogs
skillTree.description: "You'll never find such a crew - villainous scum, the lot of 'em. I certainly wouldn't want to be facing 'em in the thick of battle!"

skillTree.name: Go on Account
skillTree.description: There's a time in every sailor's, er, life when the black flag seems like the best, if not the only option.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Living Ship
skillTree.description: Deep within the boards and bulkheads, an intelligence stirs…

skillTree.name: Gambler's Wit
skillTree.description: Such things keep the eternal players' of this world alive.

skillTree.name: Coaming & Preservative
skillTree.description: Take care of your ship and she will have a care for your wellbeing in return.

skillTree.name: Black Flag
skillTree.description: Beware those who sail under the black flag - they give no quarter and never, ever give up the chase.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Arch Grand Commodore
skillTree.description: Luthor Harkon has made many great cold-blooded enemies in his time, but his Undead army fear - and feel - nothing.
